Job title: Director of Operations (Technology and Professional Services in Federal/SLED/Commercial sectors)Please note that this position requires expertise in business operations for a technology services firm. Candidates with experience in supply chain, banking, or industrial operations may not be suitable for this role. We kindly request that only candidates with experience in a technology services firm apply.Job Summary: Are you a results-driven Operations Director with a passion for success and a hunger to make a real impact? Do you dream of breaking free from the limitations of bureaucracy and taking the reins to execute your innovative ideas? Look no further, because Essnova Solutions is seeking a highly talented and driven Operations Director to join our dynamic team and help us achieve our ambitious growth goals.As our new Operations Director, you'll have the opportunity to turbocharge your career with a fast-paced, award-winning small business that's expanding across the United States. We're ranked at 163 on the Inc. 2020 listings, have a current footprint in 60+ federal agencies, and are growing at an aggressive pace. You'll work alongside a passionate, high-performing team dedicated to turning vision into reality, and have the freedom to execute your ideas without the limitations of bureaucracy.Our company was built on the American dream, and we've worked tirelessly to get to where we are today. Now, we're looking for a dynamic and growth-driven Operations Director to help take us to the next level. You'll be an integral part of the team, tasked with implementing our blueprint for success and driving our growth strategy forward.So, if you're ready to take charge of your career and make a real impact with an innovative, award-winning small business, we want you to join our team as our new Operations Director. Apply today and let's make great things happen together!Business Environment – Who We Are – Why Essnova Essnova is a fast-growing company specializing in technology and professional services for the federal sector, with traditional software development, digital transformation, value-added reseller services, geospatial solutions, environmental solutions, and professional services all built around technology as a core. Our customer footprint is spread across the United States and in OCONUS, and we are an award-winning small business, having won the SBA’s Small Business Person of the Year Award for 2020, among other accolades. As we continue to expand, we are also set to enter the State Local Education/SLED sector and grow in the commercial sector.As an authorized partner with multiple technology vendors including Microsoft, Cisco, Amazon, and some of the best emerging technology OEMs including artificial intelligence, quantum computing, and machine learning, you will be working with cutting-edge technologies that support federal government initiatives, including serving soldiers, protecting the homeland, and serving the citizens of this wonderful country. You will have the opportunity to work directly with highly educated and accomplished senior management, and be part of a success story that is dedicated to serving and making a significant impact in the federal sector. If you are excited about being part of our growth and are looking for a once-in-a-lifetime opportunity to take your career to the next level, Essnova is the right place for you.Compensation: $80,000 - $140,000/Year, plus results oriented bonus; your compensation depends on the level of experience and success rateLocation: Remote; however, the locations of federal contracting hubs like Huntsville, San Antonio, Colorado Springs, Atlanta, Charleston, DMV and others are preferableMutual Fit Selection Process:We require all candidates to take a mandatory personality and cognitive assessment survey as part of our selection process. Please click on the link below to take the survey in a quiet and distraction-free environment. The survey will provide valuable insights to determine if Essnova is a good fit for you, and whether you are a good fit for Essnova. Once completed, you will receive the results as a token of our appreciation. We will only be in touch with candidates whose survey results meet our requirements. Thank you for your cooperation, and we look forward to your application.Please note that your application will not progress to the next step without completing the following survey.Please note that your application will not progress to the next step without completing the following survey.SURVEY LINK: https://apply.select.wonderlic.com/GEJ92B/EssnovaConsultant-to-Full-Time Opportunity/Probationary Period:Please note that for this specific position, we are currently seeking individuals who can start as consultants on a 1099 basis. Upon the successful demonstration of their skills and performance, we are looking at opening up the opportunity for full-time employment. This approach is designed to reduce risk on both sides and ensure that we are a good fit for each other before committing to a long-term relationship.QualificationsBachelor's degree in Business Administration, Operations Management, or a related field (Master's degree preferred)At least 7 years of experience in business operations management, with a track record of successfully leading and executing growth strategiesExperience working in the federal, state, and commercial sectors with a strong understanding of the federal contracting space and regulationsProven experience in successfully implementing and managing operational processes, and delivering results in a fast-paced and dynamic environment one, or 2 companiesStrong leadership and team management skills with the ability to motivate and mentor a diverse group of individualsHighly analytical with a data-driven approach to decision-making, able to analyze complex data sets and develop actionable insightsExcellent communication and interpersonal skills with the ability to collaborate effectively with cross-functional teams and stakeholders at all levels of the organizationInnovative and creative thinker with an entrepreneurial mindset, able to identify opportunities and execute on them quicklyAdditionally, the following soft qualities/personality traits will make you an ideal candidate:Are you someone who thrives under pressure and is willing to take on tough efforts with complete ownership?Can you operate with limited information in ambiguity and make decisions?Do you get a thrill from rapid execution and getting things done efficiently?Are you technology-savvy and capable of utilizing tools such as artificial intelligence to automate and optimize execution?Failure doesn't scare you, and you have a knack for simplifying complex situations and putting them into action.Challenges motivate you, and you have the unique ability to rally the team towards optimal execution.Your gifted communication skills allow you to work with people both internal and external and build consensus.You have the willingness to expand horizons and work in diverse sectors, helping the company enter into multiple markets.You're comfortable working with a diverse set of personalities and skill sets, while being able to excite the team towards optimal execution.Most importantly, you possess the vision and aptitude to implement it. If this sounds like you, we want you on our team!ResponsibilitiesTaking the company's blueprint and strategy and executing them with time-bound results in mind.Collaborating with all business units within the company and putting processes in place to ensure seamless execution.Fully owning and taking responsibility for executing the strategy while providing regular updates to senior management.Communicating effectively with the internal team, customers, and partners to help build the company's brand and grow at an aggressive pace.Implementing the strategy in an agile fashion with Pareto's Principle in mind.Functioning as the second-in-command and reporting directly to the CEO of the company.Expanding the company's revenue under your leadership and opening multiple geographical locations to take the company into multiple sectors.Collaborating with a dynamic set of personnel in the company, as well as with consultants, to execute your responsibilities.Working with all business units, including human resources, program management office, financial, business development and sales, proposals, contracting, legal, marketing, and others.Shaping the existing business units and identifying and hiring top talent to build a highly successful enterprise.Identify and hire top talent and external consultants to build a highly successful enterprise and execute the strategy.Fostering a culture of continuous improvement and ensuring efficient and effective delivery of services to clients.Utilizing technology and emerging tools to automate processes and optimize execution.Managing and mitigating risks associated with operations and ensuring compliance with relevant regulations and standards.Identifying opportunities for growth and expansion into new markets and conducting market research to inform business decisions.Overseeing and managing budgets, financials, and other resources to ensure financial success.Continuously evaluating and improving operational processes to increase productivity and maximize profitability.Response Requirements:3-5 references requiredWork history for the past 10 yearsEssnova Solutions, Inc. is proud to be an Equal Opportunity Employer. We comply with all associated and required Federal Regulations and affirm that all qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, religion, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity, or national origin.Essnova performs E-Verification on all Employees
